solution_line_template: There will be {total_orchards} - {lemons_orchards} - {orange_orchards} = <<{total_orchards}-{lemons_orchards}-{orange_orchards}={remaining_orchards}>>{remaining_orchards} orchards remaining for limes and grapefruits.
Thus, {remaining_orchards} / {split_divisor} = <<{remaining_orchards}/{split_divisor}={grapefruit_orchards}>>{grapefruit_orchards} orchards will be growing grapefruits.
